custom_nodes.author: Daxamur
custom_nodes.title: DaxNodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI video processing nodes with workflow metadata support

custom_nodes.author: Dehypnotic
custom_nodes.title: RangeToString
custom_nodes.description: Lightweight node that generates a string of numbers between a start and end value. Supports positive and negative steps, configurable separators, and inclusive/exclusive end values.

custom_nodes.author: KY-2000
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-ksampler-tester-loop
custom_nodes.description: Batch samplers, schedulers, cfg, shift and steps tester custom node, automatic looping functionality for Ksampler node

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DAO_master
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI_DAO_master is a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI. These nodes provide additional tools for image creation, manipulation, and visual experimentation, with a focus on vector workflows (DXF & SVG) and production utilities.

custom_nodes.author: dimtoneff
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VL-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that integrates various Vision-Language (VL) models, including Xiaomi MiMo-VL, LiquidAI LFM2-VL, Kwai Keye-VL, AIDC-AI Ovis2.5 and Ovis-U1. Tested with models: AIDC-AI/Ovis2.5-2B, AIDC-AI/Ovis2.5-9B, Kwai-Keye/Keye-VL-8B-Preview, MiMo-VL-7B-RL-GGUF, LiquidAI/LFM2-VL-450M, LiquidAI/LFM2-VL-1.6B, AIDC-AI/Ovis-U1-3B.

custom_nodes.author: mangobyed
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YOLOv8 Object Detection Node
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node that performs object detection using YOLOv8 and outputs individual images for each detected object. Perfect for automatic mask generation, object isolation, and batch processing workflows.

custom_nodes.author: jtrue
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WordEmbeddings
custom_nodes.description: Word embedding utility nodes for ComfyUI. Load a pre-trained embedding model, explore neighbors, do analogies, and project any token/phrase onto 1D/2D/3D semantic axes with human‑readable summaries.

custom_nodes.author: ReinerBforartists
custom_nodes.title: Auto Prompt Schedule
custom_nodes.description: Auto Prompt Schedule is a ComfyUI helper node for the Prompt Schedule Node or the Batch Prompt Schedule node from Fizzledorf. You need this Prompt Schedule nodes to make use of the Auto Prompt Schedule Node.

custom_nodes.author: BEIBEI-star661
custom_nodes.title: SJ_sweepEffect_Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A high-quality sweep light effect node designed specifically for ComfyUI, supporting multiple parameter adjustments and anti-aliasing.

custom_nodes.author: bhvbhushan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LoRA Block Weight Loader
custom_nodes.description: Advanced LoRA loader with per-block weight control for fine-grained influence over different model layers in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: lucasgattas
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-egregora-tiled
custom_nodes.description: Tiled regional prompting + tiled VAE decode with seam-free blending for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: svntax
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RetroDiffusion-API-Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for the [a/Retro Diffusion API](https://retrodiffusion.ai/)

custom_nodes.author: lihaoyun6
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-QwenPromptRewriter
custom_nodes.description: Enhance your prompts using the Qwen LLM to align the behavior and capabilities of the Qwen-Image/Edit online version.

custom_nodes.author: chyer
custom_nodes.title: Chye ComfyUI Toolset
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive toolset of ComfyUI custom nodes for latent generation, image processing, and workflow utilities

custom_nodes.author: infinigence
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Infinigence-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: DrawTextNode, ...

custom_nodes.author: KohakuBlueleaf
custom_nodes.title: HDM-ext
custom_nodes.description: HDM model loader for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: TinyBeeman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TinyBee
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, designed to provide utility functions for list processing, file management, and more.

custom_nodes.author: Hangover3832
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Hangover-Utils
custom_nodes.description: This repository fully replaces and extends the previous Hangover Nodes

custom_nodes.author: BigStationW
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUi-Scale-Image-to-Total-Pixels-Advanced
custom_nodes.description: A more advanced version of the original ImageScaleToTotalPixels node

custom_nodes.author: Onionman61
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ModelScope Kontext API Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows users to perform Image-to-Image generation by calling the FLUX.1-Kontext-Dev model via the official ModelScope API.

custom_nodes.author: GeekyGhost
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Segmenting-Loader
custom_nodes.description: Lets you send a section of an image to qwen edit or kontext to help isolate areas in need of change

custom_nodes.author: saquib764
custom_nodes.title: Omini Kontext
custom_nodes.description: Nodes to use Omini Kontext framework for multi-image reference using Flux Kontext model. It has node to for Nunchaku compatibility. The is an editor node to place the character/product on the image for spatial control.

custom_nodes.author: rickrender
custom_nodes.title: Vectorizer API
custom_nodes.description: A collection of ComfyUI nodes for interfacing with the Vectorizer.ai API. Manipulate the results with options for scaling the SVG result back to raster image with increased resolution. Includes a background remover node to remove a prevalent background color from raster images. Enter credentials in config.json or directly within the node.

custom_nodes.author: obisin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - DGLS (Dynamic GPU Layer Swapping)
custom_nodes.description: Smart dynamic layer swapping between GPU and CPU for optimal inference performance with comprehensive mixed precision handling and copy-compute overlap optimization. Enables running much larger models on limited VRAM setups.

custom_nodes.author: Dehypnotic
custom_nodes.title: NumberedText
custom_nodes.description: Lightweight node to number text divisions (one per newline) and select single/multiple divisions by index with an optional separator

custom_nodes.author: moonwhaler
custom_nodes.title: SeedVR2 Tiling Upscaler
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for memory-efficient image upscaling using SeedVR2 models with advanced tiling and detail-preserving stitching.

custom_nodes.author: routhakash
custom_nodes.title: AkkiNodes LLM Suite: Your Personal AI Film Studio
custom_nodes.description: A suite of advanced ComfyUI custom nodes for a complete 'Script-to-Screen' workflow, powered by local LLMs.

custom_nodes.author: Maxed-Out-99
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SmartModelLoaders-MXD
custom_nodes.description: Smart, unified model loaders for ComfyUI that support both standard .safetensors and quantized .gguf formats — no switching nodes required. Includes flexible UNET and CLIP loaders that work across models like SDXL, SD3, Flux, and more.

custom_nodes.author: L33chKing
custom_nodes.title: Tag Frequency Weighter for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that weights tags based on their frequency/rarity in danbooru

custom_nodes.author: krigeta
custom_nodes.title: qwen-image-controlnets-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: creating a custom node to test how to use Blocknet controlnets in comfyUI using logic from Diffsynth Studio.

custom_nodes.author: jupo-ai
custom_nodes.title: comfy-linear-move
custom_nodes.description: Move nodes linearly.

custom_nodes.author: Marco Zanella
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BooleanExpression
custom_nodes.description: A collection of logic and comparison nodes for ComfyUI. This package adds building blocks for boolean logic, arithmetic comparisons, and string comparisons, making it easier to design conditional workflows directly in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: SilverAndJade
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Silver Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility nodes for ComfyUI that enhance workflow capabilities with advanced loaders and processing tools.

custom_nodes.author: WeChatCV
custom_nodes.title: Stand-In Official Preprocessor ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description:
This repository provides a temporary ComfyUI node implementation of the Stand-In preprocessor, aiming to correct the misunderstanding of Stand-In’s preprocessing logic in [a/ComfyUI-WanVideoWrapper](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-WanVideoWrapper).
[w/We strongly recommend using the workflows provided in this repo to ensure proper compatibility and the best identity-preserving performance.]

custom_nodes.author: Azornes
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Resolution-Master
custom_nodes.description: Precise resolution and aspect ratio control for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Alectriciti
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-adaptiveprompts
custom_nodes.description: Adaptive Prompts is a modern reimagining of dynamic prompts for ComfyUI. It lets you randomize, restructure, and clean up prompts with powerful wildcard and string tools. For the sake of consistency, I will still refer to them as Dynamic Prompts.

custom_nodes.author: vsLinx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI vsLinx Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes that let you quickly load multiple images via a multi-select dialog with preview. The images are instantly uploaded to the input folder and can be output either as a list or a batch.

custom_nodes.author: HoangYell
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-hoangyell-video-edit
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom ComfyUI nodes for advanced video processing and editing workflows.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_StableAvatar
custom_nodes.description: StableAvatar: Infinite-Length Audio-Driven Avatar Video Generation,you can try it in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: jupo-ai
custom_nodes.title: comfy-preview-model
custom_nodes.description: Preview media file in model's dir.

custom_nodes.author: jupo-ai
custom_nodes.title: comfy-join-prompt
custom_nodes.description: Join Multiline text.

custom_nodes.author: mamorett
custom_nodes.title: MiniCPM‑V‑4 (GGUF) for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Modular ComfyUI nodes to run the vision-language model MiniCPM‑V‑4 in GGUF format, powered by llama‑cpp‑python.

custom_nodes.author: Verolelb
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-Aspect-Ratio
custom_nodes.description: A node to provide recommended aspect ratios for the Qwen model series.

custom_nodes.author: kusurin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-chronophotography
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for creating chronophotography effects from video frames

custom_nodes.author: DenRakEiw
custom_nodes.title: Universal NN Latent Upscaler for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
A universal neural network latent upscaler that supports SD1.5, SDXL, Flux, and Wan2.2 models. Uses trained neural networks instead of simple interpolation for higher quality latent upscaling.
Built upon the excellent foundation of [a/Ttl's ComfyUi_NNLatentUpscale](https://github.com/Ttl/ComfyUi_NNLatentUpscale) - this project extends the original work with universal model support and improved architectures.

custom_nodes.author: feffy380
custom_nodes.title: Chroma Cache
custom_nodes.description: Caching optimization for Chroma

custom_nodes.author: neverbiasu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Ovis-U1
custom_nodes.description: This repository adds ComfyUI custom nodes that wrap the Ovis-U1 multimodal model, exposing three primary workflows inside the ComfyUI editor.

custom_nodes.author: FearL0rd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI MaskAIFingerprint
custom_nodes.description: Attempt to create a ComfyUI node for masking AI-generated fingerprints.

custom_nodes.author: Avalre
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-avaNodes
custom_nodes.description: These nodes were created to personalize/optimize several ComfyUI nodes for my own use. You can replicate the functionality of most of my nodes by some combination of default ComfyUI nodes and custom nodes from other developers.

custom_nodes.author: Alectriciti
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-creativeprompts
custom_nodes.description: A creative alternative to dynamicprompts

custom_nodes.author: VraethrDalkr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ProgressiveBlend
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enable progressive blending and color matching effects across image batches/video frames.

custom_nodes.author: Charonartist
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-last-frame-extractor
custom_nodes.description: This is a ComfyUI custom node that extracts the last frame (image) from an input image batch. It is particularly useful when you want to obtain the final scene or frame in a video generation workflow.

custom_nodes.author: Charonartist
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Tag Remover
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for removing specified tags and their content from text

custom_nodes.author: Comfy-Org
custom_nodes.title: NVIDIA FLUX NIM
custom_nodes.description: Provides nodes to utilise NVIDIA NIM, a set of accelerated inference microservices that allow you to run AI models on NVIDIA GPUs anywhere.

custom_nodes.author: RainyN0077
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptSE
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node for managing and combining multiple prompt entries. Supports weight adjustment, lexicon assistance, drag-and-drop sorting, and global settings to greatly enhance prompt engineering efficiency and flexibility.

custom_nodes.author: Baverne
custom_nodes.title: comfyUI-TiledWan
custom_nodes.description: Node set and workflow to run wan2.1 vace with tiled while keeping temporal and spatial consistency

custom_nodes.author: teamalpha-ai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageTransformer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI wrapper nodes for Image Transformer

custom_nodes.author: flybirdxx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SDMatte
custom_nodes.description: SDMatte is an interactive image matting method based on stable diffusion, which supports three types of visual prompts (points, boxes, and masks) for accurately extracting target objects from natural images.

custom_nodes.author: DenRakEiw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Latent Color Tools
custom_nodes.description: Advanced color manipulation and image adjustments directly in ComfyUI's latent space

custom_nodes.author: karas17
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Camera Watermark
custom_nodes.description: A versatile and highly customizable node for ComfyUI to add camera-style watermarks and frames to your images. Whether you want to emulate the classic Leica look, add EXIF data, or create professional-looking framed images, this plugin has you covered.

custom_nodes.author: njlent
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Wavelet Color Fix
custom_nodes.description:
This is a standalone node pack that provides powerful color correction methods for ComfyUI, extracted from the ComfyUI-DLoRAL project. It allows you to transfer the color profile from a source image or video to a target image or video.
This is ideal for restoring the original color to AI-processed videos (like upscaling or frame interpolation) or for creative color grading.

custom_nodes.author: impactframes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-yt_dl
custom_nodes.description: Download Youtube videos using ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: SykkoAtHome
custom_nodes.title: Sykko Tools for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Utilities for working with camera animations inside ComfyUI. The repository currently provides a node for loading camera motion from ASCII FBX files and a corresponding command line helper for debugging.

custom_nodes.author: shinyakidoguchi301
custom_nodes.title: LoRA Tag Loader for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This custom node allows you to select a LoRA file from the models/loras directory (including subfolders), automatically load training tags from metadata or Eagle MEMO, set strength, and optionally display a preview image.

custom_nodes.author: S4MUEL404
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI S4Tool Text
custom_nodes.description: Text rendering and styling nodes for ComfyUI. This extension provides a basic text renderer, multiple font loaders, and a style node that adds stroke, shadow, gradient fill, and opacity control.

custom_nodes.author: luke-mino-altherr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Latent-Reverb
custom_nodes.description: Creates spatial echo and ambient effects by applying reverb-like processing directly in latent space

custom_nodes.author: iacoposk8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI XOR Text & Pickle Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Three custom nodes for ComfyUI that allow you to encrypt and decrypt Python objects or text using simple XOR encryption.

custom_nodes.author: shinich39
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-poor-textarea
custom_nodes.description: Add commentify, indentation, auto-close brackets in textarea.
